en.no_exercises_available: No exercises available for this selection.
en.exercises_coming_soon: Exercises will be available here soon!
en.feedback_incorrect_lidwoord_check_rules: Not quite. Remember the rules for 'de' and 'het'.
en.feedback_incorrect_check_svo: Incorrect. Pay attention to the Subject-Verb-Object order.
en.home_welcome_message: Start your journey to mastering A2 level Dutch with our comprehensive lessons, grammar explanations, and practice exercises.
en.home_feature_1: Structured lessons specifically designed for A2 level.
en.home_feature_2: Detailed grammar explanations with clear examples.
en.home_feature_3: A wide variety of interactive exercises and quizzes.
en.home_feature_4: User interface available in English, Dutch, and Tagalog (learning content is in Dutch).
en.lessons_page_intro: Browse through our A2 level Dutch lessons. Click on a lesson to start learning.
en.grammar_page_intro: Explore various Dutch grammar topics. Click on a topic to learn more.
en.lesson_expl_greetings: This lesson covers essential Dutch greetings, farewells, and how to ask how someone is.
en.vocab_morning_def: The part of the day from sunrise to noon.
en.vocab_thankyou_def: A polite expression used to show gratitude.
en.lesson_expl_numbers: Learn to count in Dutch, from basic numbers to larger figures.
en.lesson_expl_travel_tickets: Learn how to ask for and buy tickets for public transport.
en.lesson_expl_food_restaurant: Practice phrases for ordering food and drinks in a Dutch restaurant.
en.grammar_expl_lidwoorden: Understand the rules for using the definite articles 'de' and 'het' in Dutch. This is a fundamental part of Dutch grammar.
en.lidwoorden_rule_common_nouns: Generally, 'de' is used for common gender nouns.
en.lidwoorden_rule_diminutives: 'Het' is always used for diminutive nouns (ending in -je, -tje, -pje, etc.).
en.lidwoorden_common_mistake_1: A common mistake is using 'de' for 'het-woorden' or vice-versa. Practice helps!
en.grammar_expl_pronouns_personal: Learn about Dutch personal pronouns (ik, jij, hij, zij, het, wij, jullie, zij) in both subject and object forms.
en.pronouns_common_mistake_1: Confusing 'hen' and 'hun' is common for native speakers too!
en.grammar_expl_verb_conjugation_present: Master the conjugation of regular and common irregular verbs in the present tense (tegenwoordige tijd).
en.verb_conjugation_present_rule_regular: Regular verbs follow a set pattern based on the stem.
en.grammar_expl_word_order_main: Learn the basic SVO (Subject-Verb-Object) word order in Dutch main clauses and how it changes with inversions (questions, or when starting with a time/place phrase).
en.word_order_inversion_question: Verb comes first in a yes/no question.

nl.error_loading_data: Fout bij het laden van gegevens
nl.select_topic_prompt: Selecteer een onderwerp om te oefenen:
nl.no_exercises_available: Geen oefeningen beschikbaar voor deze selectie.
nl.feedback_incorrect_lidwoord_check_rules: Niet helemaal. Denk aan de regels voor 'de' en 'het'.
nl.feedback_incorrect_check_svo: Incorrect. Let op de Onderwerp-Werkwoord-Object volgorde.
nl.home_welcome_message: Begin je reis naar het beheersen van A2-niveau Nederlands met onze uitgebreide lessen, grammatica-uitleg en oefeningen.
nl.home_feature_3: Een breed scala aan interactieve oefeningen en quizzen.
nl.home_feature_4: Gebruikersinterface beschikbaar in het Engels, Nederlands en Tagalog (lesmateriaal is in het Nederlands).
nl.lessons_page_intro: Blader door onze Nederlandse lessen op A2-niveau. Klik op een les om te beginnen met leren.
nl.grammar_page_intro: Ontdek verschillende Nederlandse grammaticaonderwerpen. Klik op een onderwerp voor meer informatie.
nl.lesson_expl_default: Uitleg van de les komt hier.
nl.lesson_expl_greetings: Deze les behandelt essentiÃ«le Nederlandse begroetingen, afscheid nemen en hoe je vraagt hoe het met iemand gaat.
nl.vocab_morning_def: Het deel van de dag van zonsopgang tot de middag.
nl.vocab_thankyou_def: Een beleefde uitdrukking om dankbaarheid te tonen.
nl.lesson_expl_numbers: Leer tellen in het Nederlands, van basisgetallen tot grotere cijfers.
nl.lesson_expl_travel_tickets: Leer hoe je kaartjes voor het openbaar vervoer vraagt en koopt.
nl.lesson_expl_food_restaurant: Oefen zinnen voor het bestellen van eten en drinken in een Nederlands restaurant.
nl.grammar_expl_lidwoorden: Begrijp de regels voor het gebruik van de bepaalde lidwoorden 'de' en 'het' in het Nederlands. Dit is een fundamenteel onderdeel van de Nederlandse grammatica.
nl.lidwoorden_rule_common_nouns: Over het algemeen wordt 'de' gebruikt voor de-woorden (mannelijk/vrouwelijk).
nl.lidwoorden_rule_diminutives: 'Het' wordt altijd gebruikt voor verkleinwoorden (eindigend op -je, -tje, -pje, etc.).
nl.lidwoorden_common_mistake_1: Een veelgemaakte fout is het gebruik van 'de' voor 'het-woorden' of andersom. Oefening baart kunst!
nl.grammar_expl_pronouns_personal: Leer over Nederlandse persoonlijke voornaamwoorden (ik, jij, hij, zij, het, wij, jullie, zij) in zowel onderwerps- als objectvorm.
nl.pronouns_common_mistake_1: Het verwarren van 'hen' en 'hun' komt ook vaak voor bij moedertaalsprekers!
nl.grammar_expl_verb_conjugation_present: Beheers de vervoeging van regelmatige en veelvoorkomende onregelmatige werkwoorden in de tegenwoordige tijd.
nl.verb_conjugation_present_rule_regular: Regelmatige werkwoorden volgen een vast patroon gebaseerd op de stam.
nl.verb_conjugation_present_common_mistake_: Het vergeten van de -t bij 'jij/u/hij/zij/het' vormen.
nl.grammar_expl_word_order_main: Leer de basis SVO (Onderwerp-Werkwoord-Object) woordvolgorde in Nederlandse hoofdzinnen en hoe deze verandert bij inversie (vragen, of wanneer een zin begint met een tijd/plaatsbepaling).
nl.word_order_inversion_question: Werkwoord komt eerst in een ja/nee vraag.

tl.page_title_lessons: Mga Aralin sa Dutch para sa A2

tl.no_exercises_available: Walang magagamit na pagsasanay para sa piniling ito.
tl.exercises_coming_soon: Malapit nang magkaroon ng mga pagsasanay dito!
tl.feedback_incorrect_lidwoord_check_rules: Hindi masyado. Tandaan ang mga tuntunin para sa 'de' at 'het'.
tl.feedback_correct_word_order: Magaling! Tamang ayos ng mga salita.
tl.feedback_incorrect_check_svo: Mali. Bigyang-pansin ang ayos na Simuno-Pandiwa-Layon.
tl.home_welcome_title: Maligayang Pagdating sa A2 Dutch Learner!
tl.home_welcome_message: Simulan ang iyong paglalakbay sa pag-master ng A2 level Dutch gamit ang aming komprehensibong mga aralin, paliwanag sa balarila, at mga pagsasanay.
tl.home_feature_1: Nakabalangkas na mga aralin partikular para sa A2 level.
tl.home_feature_2: Detalyadong paliwanag sa balarila na may malinaw na mga halimbawa.
tl.home_feature_3: Maraming iba't ibang interaktibong pagsasanay at quiz.
tl.home_feature_4: User interface na available sa English, Dutch, at Tagalog (ang nilalaman ng pag-aaral ay nasa Dutch).
tl.lessons_page_intro: Mag-browse sa aming mga aralin sa Dutch para sa A2 level. I-click ang isang aralin para magsimulang matuto.
tl.grammar_page_intro: Galugarin ang iba't ibang paksa sa balarila ng Dutch. I-click ang isang paksa para matuto pa.
tl.lesson_expl_default: Ang paliwanag ng aralin ay lalabas dito.
tl.grammar_expl_default: Ang paliwanag sa balarila ay lalabas dito.
tl.lesson_expl_greetings: Saklaw ng araling ito ang mahahalagang pagbating Dutch, pamamaalam, at kung paano magtanong kung kumusta ang isang tao.
tl.vocab_morning_def: Ang bahagi ng araw mula pagsikat ng araw hanggang tanghali.
tl.vocab_thankyou_def: Isang magalang na ekspresyon na ginagamit upang magpakita ng pasasalamat.
tl.lesson_expl_numbers: Matutong bumilang sa Dutch, mula sa mga pangunahing numero hanggang sa mas malalaking pigura.
tl.lesson_expl_travel_tickets: Matutunan kung paano magtanong at bumili ng tiket para sa pampublikong transportasyon.
tl.lesson_expl_food_restaurant: Sanayin ang mga parirala para sa pag-order ng pagkain at inumin sa isang Dutch restaurant.
tl.grammar_expl_lidwoorden: Unawain ang mga tuntunin sa paggamit ng mga tiyak na artikulo na 'de' at 'het' sa Dutch. Ito ay isang pangunahing bahagi ng balarila ng Dutch.
tl.lidwoorden_rule_common_nouns: Karaniwan, ang 'de' ay ginagamit para sa mga pangngalang may karaniwang kasarian.
tl.lidwoorden_rule_diminutives: Ang 'Het' ay palaging ginagamit para sa mga diminutive na pangngalan (nagtatapos sa -je, -tje, -pje, atbp.).
tl.lidwoorden_common_mistake_1: Isang karaniwang pagkakamali ay ang paggamit ng 'de' para sa 'het-woorden' o kabaliktaran. Makakatulong ang pagsasanay!
tl.grammar_expl_pronouns_personal: Alamin ang tungkol sa mga personal na panghalip sa Dutch (ik, jij, hij, zij, het, wij, jullie, zij) sa parehong anyong simuno at layon.
tl.pronouns_obj_third_person_fem: Ikatlong panauhang pambabaeng panghalip na layon.
tl.pronouns_common_mistake_1: Ang pagkalito sa 'hen' at 'hun' ay karaniwan din sa mga katutubong nagsasalita!
tl.grammar_expl_verb_conjugation_present: Masterin ang pagbabanghay ng mga regular at karaniwang di-regular na pandiwa sa kasalukuyang panahunan (tegenwoordige tijd).
tl.verb_conjugation_present_rule_regular: Ang mga regular na pandiwa ay sumusunod sa isang takdang pattern batay sa stem.
tl.verb_conjugation_present_common_mistake_: Ang pagkalimot sa -t para sa mga anyong 'jij/u/hij/zij/het'.
tl.grammar_expl_word_order_main: Alamin ang pangunahing ayos ng SVO (Simuno-Pandiwa-Layon) sa mga pangunahing sugnay sa Dutch at kung paano ito nagbabago sa mga inversion (tanong, o kapag nagsisimula sa isang parirala ng oras/lugar).
tl.word_order_inversion_question: Nauuna ang pandiwa sa isang tanong na oo/hindi.
tl.footer_text: Ang Iyong Kasama sa Pag-aaral ng A2 Dutch
